titleStmt.title: A proclamation, concerning the persons who are lyable in the payment of the annuity of teinds, their purchasing the same from His Majesty, and the collection of the arrears thereof remaining unpayed James R.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.
Loudoun, James Campbell, Earl of, d. 1684.
Loudoun, John Campbell, Earl of, 1598-1663.
Livingstoun, James.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehall, the 25 day of May, 1688.
